      • createAdjacencySetMap

        public static gnu.trove.map.TIntObjectMap<gnu.trove.set.TIntSet> createAdjacencySetMap​(java.util.List<java.util.Set<algorithms.util.PairInt>> contiguousSets)
        create a map w/ key = contiguousSets index, value = set of indexes of contiguousSets which are adjacent to key's set. Note that int[] labels usually have a value that is an index of contiguousSets. Note also that it uses a 4 neighbor region, not 8.
        Parameters:
        contiguousSets -
        Returns:
